query: ALTER TABLE recognition_logs ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS voiceComment TEXT, ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS facialExpression VARCHAR(50), ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS matchCount INT DEFAULT 0;
